page.title: 18A Day in the life of David.
page.content: I get up at seven, then I dress and have a{breakfast}of muesli,then toast. Afterwards I get washed. I go down stairs and say,"Bye" and go and call for my friend.It takes us twenty five minutes to reach school. At nine o'clock we go to{assembly} and at half past nine we return to our classroom.Sometimes we do Maths or English. Next we play and I play football. After play we might do Reading or Science.Next we have dinner and I stay at school.Sometimes we do Art in the afternoon. After that we have play and after play we sometimes do Games. At quarter to four we go home and I whatch{television.}When my daddy comes in I have tea and after tea I play with my younger brother. Then I have a bath and sometimes I have my computer out. Then I go to bed.
